justification: Misreads Team B: labels Brandon Martinez as a stable possession WR, but he’s a Tier 5 outside WR with variance—misaligned with B’s preference for possession targets and floor. Little evidence of B’s consensus-driven, injury-averse mindset or 7–1 incentives. Trade is feasible, but A gives up Sean Hernandez (Tier 1, friendly playoffs) for Xavier Rodriguez (Tier 1, declining role, tough playoffs), clashing with A’s conservative priorities. Rationale is generic and lacks context; p_accept_B is overstated for a lateral RB swap plus fringe WR.
